name: Baldy's Bird Blaster
description:
Blast those pesky Seagulls and chase that high score in this NES inspired arcade shooter!

The number of birds released can be modified. The more you shoot the more points you score.

The leaderboard is worldwide and is stored online. This requires the internet (and maybe network permissions). The latest scores are downloaded when you view the high scores in game.

Ways to play:

WASD or Arrows (Left/Right).

Left CTRL - Shoot!

Esc in main game for an options menu...

Menu navigation can be done with the Mouse, WASD or Arrows... 

1. Points for birds blasted. Hit 2 or more birds with one bullet for  a score multiplier that remains until you miss a shot.

2. Feathers can be collected for gun and ammo upgrades plus a bonus score multiplier at the end.

3. Sharp shooting gains you an accuracy multiplier on your final score. Over 100 percent accuracy can be achieved by blasting more than 1 bird with a single bullet!

4. Don't get pooped on!

Known Bugs:

The player boundaries work fine in the Unity editor without errors but I can't get Unity to build the game properly? So Baldy moves off screen if you go too far. Don't get lost out there!
